## 1. Import the dataset and load it how I want

```{r, cache = T}
profile <- read.csv("profiles.csv")

wanted_profiles <- profile[which(profile$sign == "leo" |
              profile$sign == "aquarius" | 
              profile$sign == "gemini"), ]
```


## 2. Try some multidimensional scaling on the essay questions, and color each group

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tm)
library(ggplot2)
essay_questions <- paste("essay", 0:9, sep="")
profiles_just_essays <- wanted_profiles[essay_questions]

dtm <- DocumentTermMatrix(as.matrix(profiles_just_essays), 
                          control = list(weighting = weightTfIdf, 
                                              stopwords = TRUE))

n_mds <- 2
dtm2 <- as.data.frame((as.matrix(dtm)))
dtm_mds <- as.data.frame(cmdscale(dist(dtm2), n_mds))
names(dtm_mds) <- paste0("mds", 1:n_mds)
dtm_mds$index <- 1:nrow(dtm_mds)

ggplot(dtm_mds, aes(mds1, mds2)) + geom_text(aes(label = index))
```
